title: [Silver IV] Looking for an ADC duo partner - Absolutely Expeirenced Support - Never play other roles
body:
Hey everyone, my account name is AnonymousDiamond and I am a Silver 4 player for the Oceanic Server. I am looking for a good ADC who is serious and active who we can climb to a higher division together. If you are not willing to learn and just think you're stuck with bad teams, I cannot accept you as my duo partner. For most of my games, I play Support and nothing else. I believe I have played 400+ games out of my history of 500 as a support.

As for my experience as a support, I have played over 100 ranked games as a support - I rarely play any other role unless forced to. My mains are Leona, Blitzcrank and Soraka. Leona is my most active champion - I mostly play games with her. Again, I only play Support, so if any ADC needs a support - I'm right here!

Thanks!

replies.body:

I am looking for a good ADC who is serious and active who we can climb to a higher division together. If you are not willing to learn and just think you're stuck with bad teams, I cannot accept you as my duo partner. For most of my games, I play Support and nothing else. I believe I have played 400+ games out of my history of 500 as a support.
> 
> As for my experience as a support, I have played over 100 ranked games as a support - I rarely play any other role unless forced to. My mains are Leona, Blitzcrank and Soraka. Leona is my most active champion - I mostly play games with her. Again, I only play Support, so if any ADC needs a support - I'm right here!
> 
> Thanks!

Hiya, my summoner name is Bill Shakespeare. (smurf I guess? This account is only G5 so they're not far off)
That account is currently SIlver 3 and I enjoy carrying games through the ADC role.
The ADC's I mainly play are Draven, Vayne and Graves. But I can be very flexible with my picks.
I would love to have a game with you and see how it works out. :D
I never rage and always deduct my games and see how I can improve and I can skype or just communicate through pings. :)
I'm silver IV too, keep going in and out of silver III. Fairly decent adc I think (Jinx, Vayne, Corki mostly), want to do a game or two together and see how we go?
